title: What are some old video games worth a revisit? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a man who’s beaten Half Life 1, Doom 2016, and basically all the Call of Duty games, I would replay Doom 2016, HL1 and every call of duty released at and before Black Ops 2. Other games are Minecraft just for creative mode and screwing around with mods, and even some way older titles like Frontier Elite 1. glfrontier is Frontier Elite 2 made to run on modern systems. If there’s a game I recommend it’s The Elder Scrolls Morrowind. Absolute GEM of a game even though I’ve never beat it. Super long.

Depends on what you mean by Old.For me that would be Heroes of Might and Magic 3, or the original Starcraft, as well as some less popular titles such as Alien Shooter and Zanzarah.Lego Star Wars the complete saga is also an enjoyable one.
